name: Humanoid Robots
description: Human-like robots with bipedal locomotion, designed for interaction, research, and various applications requiring human-like movement and presence.

name: Quadruped Robots
description: Four-legged robot dogs designed for mobility, exploration, and various terrain navigation. Perfect for research, security, and industrial applications.

name: Accessories
description: Essential accessories, spare parts, and add-on components to enhance and maintain your robot systems.

name: Other Robots
description: Specialized robots including wheeled robots, drones, robotic arms, and other AI-powered robotic systems that don't fit traditional categories.
